meta.description: The next In goop Health wellness summit is on November 7, 2021. Gwyneth Paltrow will be joined by incredible experts, practitioners, and thought leaders.

title: In Health - IRL wellness summit - November 7, 2021
cleaned_text:
Get our newsletter for more tips, tools, and food for thought. By clicking “sign up,” you agree to receive emails from goop and accept our and . JOIN US FOR OUR 

 NEXT IN-PERSON SUMMIT This event is sold out! For more information or questions about your tickets, visit our FAQ Page. We’re bringing our wellness summit back—and for the first time, we’re headed to the Porsche Experience Center Los Angeles in Carson, California. Our CEO, Gwyneth Paltrow, will be joined by incredible experts and thought leaders to explore what drives us. We’re approaching this summit with the intention of engaging with our dreams in new ways—mentally, emotionally, physically, and spiritually—through conversations, workshops, and a one-of-a-kind Porsche drive. We think you’re about to experience being in your body a way you never have before. We’re bringing our wellness summit back—and for the first time, we’re headed to the Porsche Experience Center Los Angeles in Carson, California. Our CEO, Gwyneth Paltrow, will be joined by incredible experts and thought leaders to explore what drives us. We’re approaching this summit with the intention of engaging with our dreams in new ways—mentally, emotionally, physically, and spiritually—through conversations, workshops, and a one-of-a-kind Porsche drive. We think you’re about to experience being in your body a way you never have before. Your pass gets you access to the full Sunday summit: the talks, workshops, food and drinks, pop-up stations, and the iconic Porsche driving experience.
• Everything from the Summit Pass, plus…
• An extra class at the summit
• Everything from the Summit Pass, plus…
• Breakfast at summit and early-a.m. access—you’ll be the first to arrive at the driving course
• An Ask Me Anything session with Gwyneth at the summit
• Breakfast at summit and early-a.m. access—you’ll be the first to arrive at the driving course
• An extra class at the summit
• An Ask Me Anything session with Gwyneth at the summit 1. Before you purchase your tickeT This event requires all guests to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19. You’ll be required to show proof of vaccination before or at the event. 2. When you purchase the ticket You’ll receive a confirmation email from [email protected] If you don’t see it in your inbox (or spam folder), email [email protected] (future communication will come from this address). Please be sure you are not unsubscribed from goop’s emails so that you’re able to receive event emails. You can subscribe here. A few weeks in advance, you’ll get an email reminder from us with pertinent details. The week before, we’ll email you an event program; everything you need to know about getting to and from the Porsche Experience Center Los Angeles in Carson, California; and on-site details. Join us for a full day of programming, including lunch, the Porsche driving experience, expert workshops, and talks hosted by GP. On November 7, 2021, we’re dropping into the Porsche Experience Center Los Angeles for a more intimate In goop Health. The spirit of our summit has always been backed by curiosity and the pursuit of joy. We go deep into exploring ways to support individual and collective well-being. We appreciate learning simple new tricks that recharge us and uncovering seismic shifts. We want to connect with and experience pleasure in our bodies. We want to feel it all. Which is why we’re teaming up with Porsche for this specific kind of unforgettable day. Every guest will have the opportunity to hit the track with world-class Porsche driving coaches. During a forty-five-minute driving experience, you’ll get behind the wheel of an incredible all-electric Taycan to test your reaction time and car-control skills. You’ll also get to navigate a 1.3-mile handling circuit in the classic Porsche 911. Here we go. We’ll meet at the Porsche Experience Center Los Angeles in Carson, California, for a mind-expanding Sunday with 200 guests. You’ll experience the workshops in groups of 50 and the driving experience in groups of 25. You do not need to register for sessions—we’ll give you an easy-to-follow schedule at the event. GP, will lead conversations with two bright minds who are pushing the culture forward. As always, she’ll cover a lot of ground with the people who are redefining and moving the needle. You’ll move through three smaller breakout sessions on cultivating creativity with Srini Pillay, getting the love you want with Sara Nasserzadeh, and finding purpose through astrology with Chani Nicholas. As mentioned, you’ll get to experience the mind-body thrill of driving a sports car— Porsche professionals included in the adventure, of course. This is where you’ll get to explore and test more wellness gems. We’ll keep you fueled with food from our very own goop Kitchen. All the swag and plenty of surprises await… Get to Know Our Experts Meet the crew of big thinkers and paradigm-shifters who will be joining us. We’ll share more talent updates here, so feel free to return and refresh. (And you might already be familiar with our boss, Gwyneth Paltrow, and some of the goop team who’ll be making cameos.) Get the answers to your q’s. If you need anything else, send us a note at [email protected]. Sign up for first access to more In goop Health updates. Stay in the loop and be first to know when tickets go on sale for future events. By clicking “sign up,” you agree to receive emails from goop and accept our and .
